thread.title: Sources: Solomon to play against Oregon State
thread.title_full: Sources: Solomon to play against Oregon State

author: Michael Cooper
title: Sources: Solomon to play against Oregon State
text:
Sources: Solomon to play against Oregon State - Tucson News Now Member Center: Sources: Solomon to play against Oregon State Posted: Arizona quarterback Anu Solomon. (Source: Tucson News Now) TUCSON, AZ (Tucson News Now) - 
Arizona Wildcats quarterback Anu Solomon will start Saturday against Oregon State, according to ESPN. 
ESPN's Brett McMurphy reported Solomon will be back as the Wildcats' play host to the Beavers. Arizona QB Anu Solomon will start vs. Oregon State source told @ESPN . Solomon had 18 consecutive starts until missing last week vs. Stanford â€” Brett McMurphy (@McMurphyESPN) October 8, 2015 
Solomon, a sophomore, was injured two weeks ago in the loss to UCLA and missed last week's game at Stanford. 
Oregon State (2-2, 0-1 Pac-12) and Arizona (3-2, 0-2) will play at 1 p.m. Saturday on FOX Sports 1.
